name: cta_1
text: Use NFTs from all universes on your $LAND. At Converge, you connect with any network you like and import your favorite items with a single click.

name: cta_2
text: Use $LAND to build up the store of your dreams! Here you can either be a real-world brand or an independent artist.

name: cta_3
text: At Converge we do heavy lifting of cross-chain intermediation for you. Mint your NFT in any network.

name: cta_4
text: Creators, Converge is for you! Our doors are open to any content creators from the world, whether you are a concept artist, an architect, a builder, a composer, or any creative mind of the outer space!
